Boring-ass game for boring-ass people. "This game is hard so when I reach high ranks I'll be really satisfied with my progress and the game will become more fun for me!". Nope. None of that will happen. Whenever you think about playing a game of CS:GO, just take a swing and punch yourself in the face. You'll save yourself a lot of time and the feeling will be the same as if you played some CS.
